articles.title: El Shaddai Game Makes Its PC Debut This April
articles.description: Port of 2011 action game was first announced back in DecemberFollowing up on its December 2020 reveal, a release window has been announced for the PC port of El Shaddai: Ascension of the Metatron. Read on for more.

articles.title: Why Don't Some People Seem to Get Hangovers?
articles.description: There's no such thing as being "immune" to hangovers. But your genes, your beverage choice, and how much you drink all contribute to your morning-after misery.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 6 - Super Himo Q, Ohajiki, and sometimes Maken Gumi... / Yoguret, Coconuts, and...
articles.description: Kokonotsu, To, and Saya visit the temple, where they find Hotaru behaving even more strangely than usual. On a separate occasion, Saya reminisces about playing with Kokonotsu when they were in the third grade.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 2 - Kinako-bou, Namaiki Beer, and... / Fue Ramune, Menko, and...
articles.description: Hotaru tells Kokonotsu that Kinako-bou grabs her attention due to its plain packaging and lack of mascot characters, calling it a desert warrior. She also gives a lecture to Kokonotsu and Saya on the history of Fue Ramune.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 1 - Umai-bou, Fries, and... / Milk Coffee Candies, Young Donuts, and...
articles.description: Kokonotsu Shikada is the son of a dagashi snack shop owner. Although he wants to become a manga artist, his father, Yo, wants him to take over the family business. One day, a girl named Hotaru Shidare shows up at the shop and challenges Kokonotsu.

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 61 - Untitled
articles.description: After defeating Hitsugaya, Captain Aizen heads for the Execution Grounds. Renji is dumbfounded as he finds himself facing Captains Aizen, Ichimaru, and Tossen at Sokyoku hill, the very same place that he was carrying Rukia away from. Captain Aizen demands Ren…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 6 - Untitled
articles.description: Rukia heads out to Urahara Store to purchase supplies which a Soul Reaper needs. The owner, Kisuke Urahara, is aloof and a bit of a mystery, but he stocks strange products which he buys from the Soul Society. The Soul Candy (gikongan) which Rukia had ordered …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 56 - Untitled
articles.description: Captain Ukitake and Captain Kyoraku face the punishment meted out by Head Captain Yamamoto's zanpaku-to. Ukitake and Kyoraku were the first two men to graduate from the Soul Reaper Academy, but even though they are two accomplished captains fighting as allies…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 52 - Untitled
articles.description: As Ichigo continues his Bankai training, Renji emerges from his own Bankai training to save Rukia. But standing in his way is none other than his own captain -- Byakuya Kuchiki. Does Renji have the strength to defeat his one-time comrade or will he be ripped …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 49 - Untitled
articles.description: Within Rukia's dream, she recalls the past which she spent training under Lieutenant Kaien and Captain Ukitake. The young Rukia admires the Lieutenant very much, and has a difficult time acknowledging what she must do after his body is taken over by a Hollow,…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 47 - Untitled
articles.description: Momo, Renji and Kira have all escaped from their cells. Momo, having read the letter that Captain Aizen left for her, believes that she understands the true reason behind Rukia and that she has identified Aizen's killer. However, when faced with the presumed …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 44 - Untitled
articles.description: Uryu has taken it upon himself to avenge the humiliation of Soken Ishida, his Quincy master and grandfather, by continuing to relentlessly battle Captain Kurotsuchi. Uryu draws upon all of the lessons he has learned, and powers he has skillfully obtained, lea…

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 9 - Home Visit
articles.description: Since there have been a series of attacks targeting BUTEI, Aria comes to stay with Akari and Nonoka for a while in case she’s being targeted by criminals who wish to retaliate against her. At the same time, Aria tries to see how Akari lives as well.

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 3 - Applying to be an Amica
articles.description: Kirin Shima is a junior high school student and an intern at Butei High School. Last year, she was an Amica with Riko Mine (current Year 2 student); however, she’s determined to become Raika Hino’s Amica this year. Will Raika accept her request?

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 1 - Another A
articles.description: Akari Mamiya is in Year 1 at Tokyo Butei High School. Although she is currently in E Rank, her goal is to become a BUTEI like Aria Kanzaki, an Upperclassman in Year 2. In order to receive training from Aria, Akari submits a request to become Aria’s Amica.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 8 - Super Scary Story Gum, Typhoon, and... / Kendama, Popping Fortune-Telling Chocolate, and...
articles.description: Kokonotsu and the gang are cooped up in Shikada Dagashi due to a typhoon. So To starts telling scary stories to liven things up. On a separate occasion, To tells Kokonotsu that he’s been researching how to become popular among girls.

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 48 - Untitled
articles.description: Rukia's execution date is advanced to a final time on the following day. Toshiro wonders if the acquisition of the Sokyoku is actually the intent of Ichimaru. Renji Abarai joins Yoruichi and Ichigo on the same training ground, with the similar goal of attaini…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 32 - Untitled
articles.description: Renji faces defeat, and in his last living moments, recalls his youth, struggling as a poor street kid with Rukia in "Hanging Dog" aka the Seventy-Eighth District of South Rukongai. He describes how they both came to move to the Seireitei to become Soul Reape…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 22 - Untitled
articles.description: Standing before the The White Road Gate is Captain Gin Ichimaru of the Third Company. Unaware that Gin is a Soul Reaper Captain, Ichigo sets upon him, ignoring Yoruichi's warnings. Upon hearing Ichigo's name, Gin draws his Zanpakuto and attacks, forcing Ichig…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 21 - Untitled
articles.description: Ichigo, Ishida, Orihime, Chad and Yoruichi get past the Seikaimon and they are nearly swallowed up by the Kototsu in the passage way that connects the real world to Soul Society. But they make it safely to Soul Society, to the Rukon District, where konpaku li…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 14 - Untitled
articles.description: Ichigo and Ishida have their hands full with hordes of Hollows. During the battle, the story of the annihilation of the Quincy is told, and the reason why Ishida hates Soul Reapers becomes clear. Although at first, Ishida insists on fighting alone, the sheer …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 37 - Untitled
articles.description: Chad's journey to the Senzaikyu is interrupted by the Captain of Squad 8, Shunsui Kyouraka. Kyouraka's laid-back mentality and attempt to convince Chad to retreat irks Chad and tries his patience. Chad realizes that time is of the essence and that he must pro…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 19 - Untitled
articles.description: The final lesson necessary to restore Ichigo's powers as a Soul Reaper is the Shattered Shaft. Ichigo's chain of fate is cut and unless he gets back his Soul Reaper powers in 72 hours, he will turn into a Hollow. Ichigo is deep in a hole in the underground tr…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 33 - Untitled
articles.description: Back in the world of the living, Karin and Yuzu find themselves entrusted with a mysterious cat that falls from the sky which draws the attention of a number of deadly Hollows. Along with Jinta and Ururu, they are recruited by television personality Don Kanon…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 20 - Untitled
articles.description: At Soul Society, Captain Gin Ichimaru of the 3rd Company appears before Byakuya after receiving word of Rukia's execution sentence. Meanwhile, Ichigo, whose Soul Reaper powers have returned, begins special training with his Zanpukuto. Each Zanpakuto has a nam…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 38 - Untitled
articles.description: Chad continues to persevere against Captain Kyouraka. Ichigo, still battling Captain Zaraki at the Senzaikyu, senses a loss of Chad's Spirit Energy and fears for the worst. Ichigo grows angrier and more determined as his sense of responsibility for the rest o…

articles.author: Marc Handelman
articles.title: BSides Huntsville 2021 – Steven Kirby’s ‘Requiem For The Password’
articles.description:
Many thanks to BSides Huntsville 2021 for publishing their tremendous conference videos on the organization's YouTube channel; a great BSides, don't miss this 10-video infosec event.

Permalink

The post BSides Huntsville 2021 – Steven Kirby’s ‘Requiem For …

articles.title: Why Don't Some People Seem to Get Hangovers?
articles.description: There's no such thing as being "immune" to hangovers. But your genes, your beverage choice, and how much you drink all contribute to your morning-after misery.

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 26 - Untitled
articles.description: The Cannonball is launched, and Ichigo and company make it over Seireitai. But because Ichigo is unable to control his spiritual power, they become stuck within the shakonaku (Soul Shield Membrane). Ichigo and the others desperately try to collect their spiri…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 24 - Untitled
articles.description: Kukaku Shiba, the one who knows how to get into Soul Society is Rokongai's top pyrotechnist. Furthermore, she is the older sister of Ganju, who appeared the previous night on a boar. Kukaku explains how she will get them into Soul Society. She will gather the…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 27 - Untitled
articles.description: Inside the Seireitei, orders are given and a full-fledged search for the Ryoka is called into action. Rukia is transferred to the Shishinro Repentence Cell to await her execution and it is becomes more imperative that Ichigo and his fellow Ryoka learn of her …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 34 - Untitled
articles.description: After word spreads of Renji's defeat, an all-out war is declared on the Ryoka, allowing all Captains of the Seiretei permission to carry and release their zanpaku-tos. However, Momo Hinamori becomes increasingly suspicious about the changes taking place aroun…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 11 - Untitled
articles.description: Rukia has been totally accepted by Ichigo's circle of friends, and Ichigo continues his work as a Soul Reaper. On this day, the two set out to exterminate a Hollow, but when they get to the location, they find nothing. The soul they find there confirms that a…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 15 - Untitled
articles.description: Yuzu gives Kon a bath and on top of that, dresses him up in a dress with a flower ornament. Kon is irate, but Ichigo pays him no attention. After overcoming many difficulties together, Kon has developed a close affinity to the Kurosaki family. But believing t…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 28 - Untitled
articles.description: Forced to stay alert and on their toes. Ichigo and the others continue to be hunted by Soul Reapers. Uryu and Orihime struggle to outwit Squad 11's Captain Zaraki and Lieutenant Yachiru in their ongoing chase, but end up in an even more threatening encounter …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 10 - Untitled
articles.description: The charismatic medium, Don Kanonji, exterminates evil spirits on his hit television program, "Journey to a Haunted Place" and the series comes on location to the town of Karakura. Ichigo hates ghost programs and refuses to go with Orihime and Keigo to see th…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 2 - Untitled
articles.description: It's the morning after Ichigo's transformation into a Soul Reaper, and no one in his family has any recollection of the events. Even the memory of him slaying a hollow is forgotten. He heads off to school, where he finds Rukia in the awkward guise of a transf…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 25 - Untitled
articles.description: With some advice from Ganju, Ichigo is finally able to control his spiritual energy in order to create the Cannonball. Now that they are ready to go, Yoruichi gives the group directions on what to do when they get to Soul Society. But Ichigo is totally spent …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 31 - Untitled
articles.description: As Renji and Ichigo engage in battle, Ichigo remembers his days of intensive training under Urahara prior to entering the Seireitei. Ichigo is forced to face and overcome his biggest fears as he proves that he has indeed developed into a opponent strong enoug…

articles.title: Why Don't Some People Seem to Get Hangovers?
articles.description: There's no such thing as being "immune" to hangovers. But your genes, your beverage choice, and how much you drink all contribute to your morning-after misery.

articles.title: Why Don't Some People Seem to Get Hangovers?
articles.description: There's no such thing as being "immune" to hangovers. But your genes, your beverage choice, and how much you drink all contribute to your morning-after misery.

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 7 - Untitled
articles.description: Ichigo and Rukia set out in search of Ichigo's body which has taken over by a mod soul. Ichigo finds it at an elementary school, but the Other Ichigo has become too strong and gets away. In the midst of battle, Rukia receives a word through her Soul Cell Phon…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 54 - Untitled
articles.description: Rukia stands on the Sokyoku at the brink of her execution, not knowing that help is on the way. Captain Ukitake, Captain Kyoraku, Ichigo, and his dedicated comrades are all racing to save her life. Will they make it in time or will the power of one million za…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 53 - Untitled
articles.description: As Rukia Kuchiki is being lead to her execution, she is stopped by the ever-devious Gin Ichimaru. Just when Rukia has prepared herself for death, her concentration is broken by Gin's offer to let her live and her concern over Renji, whose pain she can sense. …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 50 - Untitled
articles.description: In the world of the living, Don Kanonji searches for a way to save his television show, as its ratings continue to plummet. He discovers Kon- the mod-spirit trapped inside the body of a stuffed animal- and decides to make Kon the mascot of his show. After nam…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 60 - Untitled
articles.description: Central 46 is the highest judicial body in the Soul Society. After breaking into Central 46, Captain Hitsugaya and Rangiku discover that the forty Sages and six Judges were slaughtered days earlier. Captain Hitsugaya and Rangiku soon find that they are not th…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 46 - Untitled
articles.description: Momo recalls her training at the Soul Reaper Academy, where she recounts meeting and being a member of a group field training session with Izuru Kira and Renji Abarai where they must venture to the World of the Living and participate in a training exercise ag…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 45 - Untitled
articles.description: Yoruichi trains Ichigo, educating him about the potential to transcribe a zanpaku-to's main form and materialize it. He is moving toward bankai training from the shikai training of dialogue and harmonization, and to do so he must face and conquer difficult ch…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 40 - Untitled
articles.description: Ichigo and Captain Zaraki lie motionless on the ground after their battle. Zaraki admits defeat and remains alive just long enough to recount his meeting with Yachiru. Yoruichi finds Ichigo and takes him away for treatment. Ganju and Hanataro continue toward …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 42 - Untitled
articles.description: Yoruichi appears as Ichigo prepares to face Squad captains Kuchiki and Ukitake. In order to save Ichigo from a fool's battle, Yoruichi pounds an anesthetic into Ichigo, rendering him unconscious. Yoruichi's flash steps prevent the two of them from being struc…

articles.title: Why Don't Some People Seem to Get Hangovers?
articles.description: There's no such thing as being "immune" to hangovers. But your genes, your beverage choice, and how much you drink all contribute to your morning-after misery.

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 11 - Showdown
articles.description: Akari decides to fight Kyochikutou together with her friends. Kyochikutou demands that Akari give her Takamakuri, one of the Mamiya techniques, and threatens to kill everyone if Akari doesn’t give her what she wants.

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 10 - First Mission
articles.description: Aria is injured in a gun battle and taken to the hospital. Meanwhile, after Kyochikutou declares that no one will have to get hurt if Akari surrenders to her advances, Akari tries to send Nonoka to stay with their aunt in Nagano.

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 5 - Quartet, Part 2
articles.description: The Quartet match between Team Mamiya and Team Takachiho has begun. While Akari and Shino go out to find their opponent’s eye flag, Raika and Kirin defend their eye flag from an attack by Hina Fuma, who seems to know where their eye flag is.

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 6 - Little Devils’ Request
articles.description: Although Raika doesn’t want to admit it, she seems to be worried about Kirin and Riko’s relationship. On the other hand, Kirin is worried about Raika and Akari’s relationship. In order to resolve the situation, Kirin takes action.

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 12 - A Pair of As
articles.description: Kyochikutou’s sister, Suimitsutou, goes on a rampage while demanding to have her sister returned to her. Aria, Akari and the others work together to bring her down.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 12 - I’m Gonna Eat It-Hi, Poem of Cherries, and... / Morinaga Milk Caramel, Sakuma Drops, and...
articles.description: While Hotaru and Saya discuss matters of love, Kokonotsu and To seek once again to improve their fortunes through dagashi. Another day, Kokonotsu tries to use his knowledge of dagashi to impress an expectant Hotaru.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 3 - Buta-men, Kuru Kuru Bou Jelly, and... / Bontan-ame, Seven Neon, and...
articles.description: Hotaru exacerbates the summer heat by turning off the shop's AC and boiling water to make Buta-men. Saya's suspicions are raised when Hotaru asks about her relationship with Kokonotsu.

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 9 - Untitled
articles.description: The Grand Fisher appears before Ichigo and his friends. He is a Hollow who uses a lure to seek out humans with strong spiritual energy. Ichigo is shocked when he sees the lure. It has the shape of the young girl he saw six years ago when his mother died. Fill…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 8 - Untitled
articles.description: The Kurosaki family drops everything to visit the grave of Ichigo's mother. Ichigo intended to take a day off from Soul Reaper duties, but finds Rukia waiting for him at the cemetery. When she learns how Ichigo's mother died, Rukia suggests that perhaps the H…

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 5 - Bottle Ramune, Baby-Star Ramen, and... / Yatta Men, Watch Out for the Sour Grape, and...
articles.description: Hotaru visits Shikada Dagashi after business hours to conduct a covert exchange with Kokonotsu’s father Yo. Later, she lets Kokonotsu and To in on her secret moneymaking technique.

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 58 - Untitled
articles.description: The fierce battle between Ichigo and Captain Byakuya rages on. Ichigo taunts Byakuya and demands that he use his bankai against him, while Byakuya remains visibly unmoved by Ichigo's amazing display of power. Meanwhile, Uryu, Chad, Orihime, Ganju, and their n…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 55 - Untitled
articles.description: While Renji hurries to get Rukia out of harm's way, Ichigo stays behind to hold off Byakuya Kuchiki. Though Rukia was wrong about Ichigo's ability to save her from execution, she does not believe that he can survive another battle with her brother. In an atte…

articles.title: Why Don't Some People Seem to Get Hangovers?
articles.description: There's no such thing as being "immune" to hangovers. But your genes, your beverage choice, and how much you drink all contribute to your morning-after misery.

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 3 - Untitled
articles.description: Not all souls pass on properly into the Soul Society. Sadly, they are abandoned and become Hollows. In the midst of this transformation, they lose their hearts and seek out those they loved most while they were alive. Therefore, it is only natural that Orihim…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 16 - Untitled
articles.description: Two representatives from Soul Society appear before Rukia. They are 6th Company Asst. Captain Renji Abarai and Captain Byakuya Kuchiki, Rukia's older brother. Swinging his Zanpakuto, Renji demands to know the whereabouts of the human who took Rukia's Soul Rea…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 12 - Untitled
articles.description: The last Quincy, who hates Soul Reapers — Uryu Ishida, challenges Ichigo to a duel. He will scatter bait to lure Hollows to the town and the one "who kills the most Hollows" will win. Ichigo adamantly refuses, but is forced into the duel when Uryu scatters th…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 35 - Untitled
articles.description: When Captain Aizen is discovered slain and hung, Hinamori quickly suspects Ichimaru. In a bout of revenge, Hinamori tries to attack Ichimaru, but is stopped first by Lieutenant Kira and then by Toshiro Hitsugaya, the captain of Squad 10. Ichigo and Ganju cont…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 17 - Untitled
articles.description: Renji unleashes the full power of his Zanpakuto towards Ichigo who is unable to beat back this fierce attack. But Rukia knows that Ichigo will not give up no matter how overpowered he is. Fearing that Ichigo will be killed, Rukia throws herself before Renji t…

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 7 - Struggle over Akari
articles.description: Takachiho decides to take action to make her fantasies about getting close to Akari a reality. But when Shino catches on, she challenges Takachiho to a duel.

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 4 - Quartet, Part 1
articles.description: Quartet refers to an actual fighting test between two four-person groups and is a requirement for all the Year 1 students at Butei High. Akari forms a group with Shino, Raika and Kirin and trains to defeat their opponent, Urara Takachiho’s team.

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 2 - Dangerous Relationship
articles.description: Since Akari has been talking about Aria all the time after she became Aria’s (yet to be official) Amica, Shino increasingly becomes worried that Akari may not stay a close friend with her. In order to resolve the situation, she invites Akari to her home.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 11 - Cola Gum, Yo, and... / Miyako Kombu, Ramune, and...
articles.description: When Kokonotsu asks why Shidare Company wants to recruit his dad, Hotaru tries to show him and Saya how amazing Yo is. On a separate occasion, Kokonotsu and Hotaru discuss dagashi while waiting for a train.

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 5 - Untitled
articles.description: Rukia and Chad battle the Hollow Shrieker which has haunted the "Cursed Cockatiel." They fight even though Rukia's powers still have not completely returned, and Chad is unable to see Hollows. But this Shrieker has beaten many Soul Reapers and committed count…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 63 - Untitled
articles.description: eace returns as the Soul Society recuperates from the deep wounds left by the treachery of Captain Aizen and his partners in crime. Captain Komamura and Lieutenant Hisagi visit the graves of fallen comrades, while Hitsugaya visits Hinamori and hopes for her q…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 59 - Untitled
articles.description: Byakuya Kuchiki may have been impressed by the power exerted by Ichigo, the substitute Soul Reaper, but he's not done fighting yet. With spiritual pressure shaking the entire Seireitei, Orihime, Chad, Uryu, and Ganju wait helplessly nearby, knowing that all t…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 57 - Untitled
articles.description: Fueled by anger and feelings of abandonment and betrayal, Soi Fon persists in her attempt to destroy her former master Yoruichi Shihouin, but her abilities may be hampered by her cocksure attitude. At the execution site, the battle between Ichigo and Byakuya …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 43 - Untitled
articles.description: Orihime and Uryu, dressed as Soul Reapers, are met by members of Squad 12 who offer to help them, but Uryu quickly realizes that it is a trap. Squad 12's Captain Kurotsuchi presents himself to Orihime and Uryu, criticizing Uryu as a Quincy who has no chance o…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 41 - Untitled
articles.description: Yoruichi's true form is revealed, much to Ichigo's surprise. Ichigo finds a mysterious mask that he remembered Hanatoro throwing into an underground tunnel. Sensing great Spirit Energy near the Repentance Cell, Ichigo defies Yoruichi's orders and flees to ass…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 39 - Untitled
articles.description: After being attacked by Captain Zaraki's sword, while lying weak on the ground, Ichigo is greeted by a metaphysical version of his zanpaku-to, Zangetsu. Zangetsu takes Ichigo to develop his understanding about the nature of his zanpaku-to. When Ichigo calls a…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 30 - Untitled
articles.description: Hanataro leads Ichigo and Ganju toward the Repentance Cell where Rukia is being imprisoned using an underground network of sewage system passageways. As Hanataro guides them, he recounts the stories that Rukia had told him about her time in the world of the l…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 1 - Untitled
articles.description: Meet Ichigo Kurosaki, age 15. He's a high-school student who possesses the uncanny ability to see ghosts. But when he meets Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper from the Soul Society who helps lost souls find peace, his not-so-normal life becomes even more abnormal. …

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 13 - Untitled
articles.description: The demonic hands of a Hollow reach out for Orihime and Tatsuki. The Hollow releases seeds which turn humans into zombies which attack other humans. Orihime and Tatsuki are surrounded by the student zombies. In their attempt to escape, Tatsuki is hit by a see…

articles.title: Why Don't Some People Seem to Get Hangovers?
articles.description: There's no such thing as being "immune" to hangovers. But your genes, your beverage choice, and how much you drink all contribute to your morning-after misery.

articles.title: Aria the Scarlet Ammo AA (German Europe) - Episode 8 - Pool Trap
articles.description: After asserting that her love for Akari is stronger than Shino's, Urara Takachiho invites Akari on an exclusive visit to her family's water park, but others end up tagging along – including Shino.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 9 - Wata-pachi, Lucky Choco-droppings, and... / Sakura Daikon, Egg Ice Cream, and...
articles.description: Despite suffering from a mouth ulcer, Hotaru ignores Saya's protestations and eats a dagashi that packs a punch. Later on, Hotaru lets Kokonotsu in on the secret of her origins.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 7 - Summer Festival, Hotaru, and... / Summer Festival, Saya, and...
articles.description: It’s summer festival time! Hotaru plans to convert her meager 200 yen of spending money into big winnings at the die-cutting stall. Later on, Saya is very happy when Yo suggests that Kokonotsu escort her around the festival.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 10 - That's Dagashi!
articles.description: When Hotaru doesn't show up at Shikada Dagashi for two days, a concerned Kokonotsu and Saya visit her house to investigate. It appears Hotaru has come down with a cold so powerful that she doesn’t even want to eat dagashi.

articles.title: Dagashi Kashi (German Dub) - Episode 4 - Fugashi, Fugashi, and... / Glico, Glico, and...
articles.description: Hotaru challenges Kokonotsu to compete in a blind fugashi taste test. She also helps him to run back to Café Endo when she realizes that he forgot something very important to him at the café.

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 62 - Untitled
articles.description: Furious after hearing the news of the defection of three captains, Sajin Komamura arrives at the Sokyoku ready to beat the treachery out of Aizen and his lackeys. Captain Komamura quickly realizes that deception is even a part of Sosuke Aizen's fighting techn…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 4 - Untitled
articles.description: Chad, Ichigo's classmate and friend, is given a cursed cockatiel. He brings the bird to school, along with a plethora of injuries to his large body. Sensing spirit energy in the bird, Rukia feels they need to perform a Konso on the cockatiel and help its soul…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 51 - Untitled
articles.description: Preparations are underway for Rukia's execution, when Ganju, Uryu, and Chad receive unannounced visitors to their prison cell. Kenpachi, Yumichika, Yachiru along with Orihime, break into the prison cell to assist the Ryoka in an escape. Once they are discover…

articles.title: Bleach (German Dub) - Episode 36 - Untitled
articles.description: As Ichigo, Ganju, and Hanataro make their way to the top of the Senzaikyu staircase, they sense an unprecedented, vast amount of unrecognizable spirit energy. The source of this spirit energy reveals itself as Kenpachi Zaraki, the captain of Squad 11, who Ich…
